title: SA records fourth coronavirus death as 74yo man succumbs to COVID-19
description: An Adelaide man dies from COVID-19 in the Royal Adelaide Hospital overnight. He is the fourth person to die from the virus in the state.
content:
Posted April 12, 2020 09:36:04 A man has died from COVID-19 in the Royal Adelaide Hospital. Key points:
  • SA Health said the man contracted the virus from the Ruby Princess
  • The state's total number of confirmed cases currently sits at 429
